## IHandleMessageArgs.save property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
>
> Please call [dataStoreSaveMessage()](./core-types.idatastore.datastoresavemessage.md) after handling the message and determining that it must be saved.

Optional. If set to `true`, the message will be saved using [dataStoreSaveMessage](./core-types.idatastore.datastoresavemessage.md) <p/><p/>

**Signature:**

```typescript
save?: boolean;
```
